entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
